ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 import dw::Crypto output application/json --- { "HMACBinary": Crypto::HMACBinary("abcdef" as Binary, payload as Binary), "HMACWithSHA256": Crypto::HMACWith("abcdef" as Binary, payload as Binary, "HmacSHA256"), "HMACWithSHA512": Crypto::HMACWith("abcdef" as Binary, payload as Binary, "HmacSHA512"), "MD5": Crypto::MD5(payload as Binary), "SHA1": Crypto::SHA1(payload as Binary), "hashWithMD2": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "MD2"), "hashWithMD5": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "MD5"), "hashWithSHA-1": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "SHA-1"), "hashWithSHA-256": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "SHA-256"), "hashWithSHA-384": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "SHA-384"), "hashWithSHA-512": Crypto::hashWith(payload as Binary, "SHA-512")
}
